original_title: Parliament descends into chaos over recent arrest of civilians at Kovil
original_body_lines: A contentious situation ensued in parliament on Tuesday morning (March 19) as MPs of the Tamil National Alliance (TNA) staged a protest while holding placards.
They were protesting against the recent arrest of eight civilians who were conducting a ‘pooja’ in view of the Maha Shivaratri Day on March 08 at a Kovil in Vavuniya.
